text: Andrea Borgato (born 14 December 1972) is an Italian para table tennis player and has represented his country in 2012 Summer Paralympics and 2016 Summer Paralympics. He became quadriplegic after being involved in a car accident in 1995. ==References== Category:Italian male table tennis players Category:Paralympic table tennis players of Italy Category:Table tennis players at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Living people Category:1972 births
title: Andrea Borgato
